original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify them (Person, Location, Organization, etc.).
optimised_prompt:
<instructions>
    1. Extract named entities from the provided text and classify them into the following categories: Person, Location, and Organization.
  </instructions>
  <context>
    The input data contains sentences that may feature various named entities. 
  </context>
  <example>
    Input: "EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb. Peter Blackburn BRUSSELS 1996-08-22..."
    Output: { "Person": ["Peter Blackburn"], "Location": ["EU", "Germany", "Britain", "BRUSSELS"], "Organization": ["European Commission"] }
  </example>

evaluation_details: { "Person": ["Tang Shubei"], "Location": ["China", "Taiwan", "BEIJING"], "Organization": ["Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits", "Xinhua"] }
